forecast.day_comments: Snow before 11am, then rain and snow showers. Some thunder is also possible.  High near 40. South wind 8 to 10 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total daytime snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Rain and snow, becoming all snow after 11pm. Some thunder is also possible.  Low around 29. South wind 5 to 8 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of around an inch possible.
